key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting mortgage asset values and cost of capital
Credit risk from non-performing loans and non-agency mortgage-backed securities
Dependency on external management introducing operational risks
Market volatility affecting financial performance and asset liquidity
Dividend sustainability concerns in a challenging interest rate environment
controversies: Potential conflicts of interest due to reliance on parent company for management
Regulatory scrutiny in a heavily regulated mortgage REIT environment
governance_issues: Conflicts of interest with external manager, PNMAC Capital Management, LLC
Regulatory changes impacting operations and profitability
